backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister with access control, blob storage, user profile management, and order creation logic with ID info and admin-invitation mappings.
backend/old.mo: Legacy module defining older Order and UserProfile types plus a minimal Actor state structure.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference in build planning.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Full deployment guide explaining how to deploy the backend to the Internet Computer and host the frontend on cPanel.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables with dark mode and global layout rules.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/.htaccess: Optional Apache config providing compression, caching, security headers, and MIME types for static hosting.
frontend/public/DEPLOYMENT.md: Frontend hosting guide for deploying the React build to cPanel while the backend remains on the Internet Computer.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component handling hash-based routing, authentication gates, admin invitation logic, and route rendering.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Guards admin-only routes by checking authentication and admin status, showing appropriate UI for loading, errors, or denied access.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminInvit: Modal allowing users to accept or decline admin invitations, with mutation handling and error display.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOrder: Editable admin form for updating order customer and shipping details with validation and change detection.
frontend/src/components/admin/PaymentCon: React component providing a form to edit payment contact status and notes, with UI controls and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides login/logout button using Internet Identity and manages related query invalidation.
frontend/src/components/LoginRequiredScr: UI screen prompting users to log in with Internet Identity before accessing protected actions.
frontend/src/components/PrincipalIdFoote: Empty placeholder component with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/SignaturePad.tsx: Canvas-based signature input component allowing drawing, clearing, and emitting signature data URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Hook to check if the current user is an admin, handling fallback authorization logic and query states.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBootstrap.ts: Hook that auto‑assigns admin role to a designated bootstrap principal and refreshes related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminInvitation.ts: Hooks for checking, accepting, and declining admin invitations with retry logic and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminRestore.ts: Hook that reassigns admin role to the caller and invalidates admin-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnsureUserRole.ts: Hook ensuring authenticated users have refreshed role-related data by invalidating and refetching caches once per user.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, identity persistence, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: React Query hooks for submitting and fetching orders and updating order statuses via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Hooks to fetch and save the caller's user profile and manage related query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileGate.ts: Determines whether an authenticated user must complete profile setup based on profile fetch state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with theme variables, typography, transitions, and layout rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Admin view for a single order, enabling status updates, payment updates, and editing core order details.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin dashboard listing all orders with search, filtering, statistics, and deletion options.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with hero banner, marketing content, and navigation buttons for ordering and pricing.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Displays the user's orders, allows viewing order details, and handles authentication gating.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows order confirmation details and a modal with payment contact instructions.
frontend/src/pages/OrderPage.tsx: A full order form page handling authentication, form validation, ID info generation, file uploads, signatures, and submitting an order.
frontend/src/pages/PricesPage.tsx: Displays static pricing details, feature list, pricing tiers, and a button navigating to the order page.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Allows authenticated users to view and update their profile, with admin‑specific restore actions and success message handling.
frontend/src/utils/assetPaths.ts: Utility helpers for generating base‑path‑safe URLs for static assets and documents.
frontend/src/utils/errorFormatting.ts: Error formatting utilities that extract readable messages and redact sensitive information from errors.
frontend/src/utils/fileValidation.ts: Provides client-side image file validation and a helper to convert files to byte arrays.
frontend/src/utils/idGenerators.ts: Generates random names and US-style addresses using local data lists.
frontend/src/utils/orderFormatting.ts: Formats backend timestamps and enum values into human-readable order and payment status strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/usStates.ts: Exports a constant list of US states with value/label pairs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state, requirements, and pending fixes for admin UI visibility and invitation handling.
